last_episode_to_air.name: Take the Leap
last_episode_to_air.overview: In the final round of Internationals, A-Troupe face off against fearsome competitors, sticking together through their biggest challenge yet.

name: The Next Step
overview: Follow the lives of an elite group of young dancers who train at The Next Step Studio.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: As A-Troupe dancers prepare for the regional dance competition, relationships and loyalties are tested to the extreme.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: A-Troupe are going to the Absolute Dance Nationals! But with a new competition, comes new challenges. In the search for the best team, an opportunity arises for dancers from other studios that didn't win Regionals to try out for a spot on the Nationals team. But could this come at the cost of tearing apart the team who won Regionals together?

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: The Next Step Dance Studio must overcome their own professional and personal challenges on their journey towards Absolute Dance Internationals.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: After winning Internationals in Miami, A-Troupe has made a name for themselves in the dance world, putting The Next Step Dance Studio on the map. But their return to Regionals means the departure of beloved team-meates, forcing the team to start from scratch. A-Troupe must fight harder than ever to make it back to the top.

seasons.name: Season 5
seasons.overview: Since losing at Regionals, A-Troupe is once again the underdog, but that won’t deter them from getting back to the top. As many dancers leave to pursue their goals and dreams, former dance captain Emily steps in to take control of the studio. But her strict regime isn’t welcomed by everyone and the studio quickly divides into two. Only one team can make it to Regionals and it’s a full out battle between East vs. West.

seasons.name: Season 6
seasons.overview: After a major shock sends the studio reeling, The Next Step finds themselves scrambling to get back on the road to competition. But while some of the dancers think it should be all for one and one for all, others declare that when it comes to winning… all bets are off. Can the dancers put aside their differences to bring home a victory?

seasons.name: Season 7
seasons.overview: As A-Troupe speeds towards Nationals, things take an unexpected turn when a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity shakes up the studio. A-Troupe struggles to stay united as they face the biggest decision of their dance careers. Does A-Troupe have what it takes to make it on dance’s biggest stage? Will a new group of talented dancers emerge as the future of TNS? This season, all bets are off.

seasons.name: Season 8
seasons.overview: A fierce rivalry begins as A-Troupe and B-Troupe battle to decide which team will represent The Next Step at Nationals. When the dust settles, one team must overcome their underdog status and prove they have what it takes to be champions, while the other decides to stop playing by anyone else's rules and show the world they are true triple threats.

seasons.name: Season 9
seasons.overview: Hot off their triumphant win at Nationals, A-Troupe face their own personal challenges, dealing with loss, disappointment, and failure on the road to Internationals. But if they’re able to bounce back from their personal losses, and help each other through the tough times, they will learn what it truly means to win.

episodes.name: Get the Party Started
episodes.overview: A new dancer comes into the studio to join the A-Troupe and the other dancers are impressed. They work hard to train for the upcoming competition.

episodes.name: Everybody Dance Now
episodes.overview: When a top dancer isn't chosen for the A-Troupe, Emily realizes that her position as captain is in danger of being handed to someone else.

episodes.name: Dance, Dance
episodes.overview: The troupe is broken into two teams and the captains push their new teams to outshine the others. Kate emphasizes the meaning of teamwork to the troupe.

episodes.name: Rock and a Hard Place
episodes.overview: Emily is put in charge of arranging the dancers in their spots for the upcoming group dance. She takes the opportunity to show Michelle where she stands with her, by putting her in the back row.

episodes.name: Steal My Sunshine
episodes.overview: The girls go to the beach. Meanwhile, Emily and the E-Girls take leadership at a Dance Camp. They manage to accidentally lose one of the girls.

episodes.name: Good Girls Go Bad
episodes.overview: Emily convinces some of the A-Troupe dancers to spy on their main competition.

episodes.name: Love Story
episodes.overview: Emily agrees to go on a date with Eldon whilst Michelle is still at Elite making the only choice she has to pretend to audition for there team, Miss Kate is worried she will loose Michelle forever. James has a math test

episodes.name: Just the Two of Us
episodes.overview: When Eldon is told that he has to choose a duet partner, he struggles whether he is going to go with Emily or Michelle. West gets upset when he and Stephanie don't see eye to eye on their duet piece.

episodes.name: Video Killed the Radio Star
episodes.overview: One of The A-Troupe members is picked to be in music video, but when Emily's dance routine isn't up to the standards of the other dancers, they get upset with her.

episodes.name: Road to Joy
episodes.overview: James attempts to connect with Riley when he goes with her to get the costumes. Meanwhile at the studio, Stephanie poses for some pictures.

episodes.name: Can You Keep a Secret?
episodes.overview: Michelle discovers what secret Chloe has been hiding and the dancers compete for the solo spot in the competition.

episodes.name: Get It Together
episodes.overview: Michelle secretly comes up with a routine and has some of the girls learn it. However, when one of the E-Girls is picked to learn it, a big problem arises.

episodes.name: Don't Go Breaking My Heart
episodes.overview: Emily's suspicions of Michelle grow and Eldon comes to the realization that he needs to be honest. He tells everyone about him and Emily.

episodes.name: Sabotage
episodes.overview: The battle for the top spot is on and Kate reveals Michelle's secret routine. A new captain is named.

episodes.name: Changes
episodes.overview: Emily and Stephanie struggle seeing Michelle as the dance captain.

episodes.name: Help
episodes.overview: Emily and Eldon bond over a secret.

episodes.name: Forget You
episodes.overview: Emily accuses Michelle of having feelings for Eldon, when she is placed on the back row.

episodes.name: Brand New
episodes.overview: A-Troupe decides to hold auditions for two new dancers to replace Emily and Stephanie.

episodes.name: First Date
episodes.overview: With a new A-Troupe assembled, the dancers decide to change the Regionals routine.

episodes.name: We Are Family
episodes.overview: Riley tries to make her relationship with Emily as sisters work out.

episodes.name: Break Stuff
episodes.overview: Giselle wants to make her mark in A-Troupe by performing a dangerous lift.

episodes.name: Come Back... Be Here
episodes.overview: With Daniel leaving A-Troupe, Michelle and the team try and get Emily to come back.

episodes.name: Dancing in the Street
episodes.overview: When A-Troupe get themselves into a dance battle with the street crew, Seeds, the team finds out that West was a former member of Seeds.

episodes.name: Price Tag
episodes.overview: Chloe’s financial problems finally boil over and she is forced to leave A-Troupe.

episodes.name: Bad Moon Rising
episodes.overview: Kate and Chris hold a party at The Next Step Dance Studio for the team to hang out not as dancers, but as friends.

episodes.name: Can't Fight This Feeling
episodes.overview: Reality-style drama following a group of dancers. The dancers are excited when their regional costumes arrive, but they are the wrong ones.

episodes.name: I'm So Excited
episodes.overview: West offers to help Seeds, as A-Troupe head to regionals.

episodes.name: Fancy Footwork
episodes.overview: During regionals, one of the dancers encounters a costume error.

episodes.name: This Is How We Do It
episodes.overview: Reality-style drama following a group of dancers. The Next Step must face Seeds in the semi-final of the regionals.

episodes.name: Winner Takes All
episodes.overview: The Next Step studio is up against Elite Studios as the final two groups to perform at the regionals.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: As A-Troupe dancers prepare for the regional dance competition, relationships and loyalties are tested to the extreme.

episodes.name: Don't Stop the Party
episodes.overview: The A-Troupe is reunited after their win at regionals, but they learn quickly that the rules at nationals are different and their team dynamic could be in jeopardy. Emily and Michelle set aside their differences over Eldon and agree to focus their energies on the nationals preparation.

episodes.name: My Boyfriend's Back
episodes.overview: A-Troupe meets its new choreographer and votes for open auditions for the nationals team. A-Troupers, B-Troupers, J-Troupers plus unexpected newcomers all show up for the nationals team auditions.

episodes.name: Ready to Start
episodes.overview: The first round of auditions for the nationals team takes place. Phoebe, the new head choreographer, challenges the dancers with her choreography for the final round.

episodes.name: The Final Cut
episodes.overview: Reality-style drama following the lives of a group of dancers at the Next Step Dance Studio. The nationals team is chosen, with devastating results for some A-Troupers. Hunter enlists Emily's help to make Michelle jealous

episodes.name: The Girl is Mine
episodes.overview: Hunter challenges Eldon to a secret dance battle, with Michelle as the prize. Kate asks James to dance a duet with Beth when her partner drops out.

episodes.name: Work It
episodes.overview: Reality-style drama following the lives of a group of dancers at the Next Step Dance Studio. With new members in place, the team fundraises to buy designer uniforms. Michelle is confused when Eldon avoids her as a result of losing the dance battle

episodes.name: It Takes Two
episodes.overview: Reality-style drama following the lives of a group of dancers at the Next Step Dance Studio. Solo and duet competitors are chosen for nationals, where each round is an elimination. Michelle is hurt when Eldon won't do the duet with her. Riley's world comes crashing down when James betrays her.

episodes.name: What'll I Do
episodes.overview: Auditions for the small group dance are held amid personal betrayals and misunderstandings. James apologises to Riley but she cannot bring herself to forgive him.

episodes.name: Never Enough
episodes.overview: Reality-style drama following the lives of a group of dancers at the Next Step Dance Studio. James and Riley struggle with their duet. Michelle demands an answer from Eldon - why is he avoiding her?

episodes.name: I Hope I Get It
episodes.overview: As the studio grows in popularity, it must make space for new members of J-Troupe. Emily asks Hunter to help her with J-Troupe auditions to make Michelle jealous but enjoys herself with Hunter more than she expected.

episodes.name: Anything You Can Do, I Can Do Better
episodes.overview: As the studio grows in popularity it must make space for new members of J-Troupe. Michelle and Amanda promote the studio at their school while the others mentor J-Troupe. Daniel gives Kate an ultimatum.

episodes.name: Time to Move On
episodes.overview: Riley struggles to move on from James while still working on their duet. Emily and Hunter get to know each other better when they get locked in the costume closet together.

episodes.name: The Truth Comes Out
episodes.overview: Michelle finds out about the dance battle and Hunter gets a chance at the nationals solo spot. Phoebe challenges select A-Troupers and J-Troupers to create a song and a dance in 24 hours.

episodes.name: Sing
episodes.overview: Reality-style drama following the lives of a group of dancers at the Next Step Dance Studio. Michelle holds a scholarship fundraiser for young dancers while the elite competition gets a step up. Amanda misses a band practice and feels bad about lying to her new friends. West and Giselle get caught up in a talent war.

episodes.name: You're the One That I Want
episodes.overview: Reality-style drama following the lives of a group of dancers at the Next Step Dance Studio. Giselle and Thalia think a little competition will be good motivation for James and Riley. Hunter invites Michelle to a concert. James and Eldon do some male bonding while Amanda sympathizes with Emily.

episodes.name: Hazy Shade of Winter
episodes.overview: Reality-style drama following the lives of a group of dancers at the Next Step Dance Studio. Michelle confronts Emily about the kiss. Thalia and Giselle try to convince James and Riley to take the duet back. Hunter is confused and Michelle has something important to discuss with Kate

episodes.name: Game On
episodes.overview: Reality-style drama following the lives of a group of dancers at the Next Step Dance Studio. The pressure is on for nationals when a key member leaves the troupe, and the team can't afford to lose anyone else. Amanda and Riley audition for the solo, while Emily puts herself on the line to save her team.

episodes.name: Make a Plan to Love Me
episodes.overview: Reality-style drama following the lives of a group of dancers at the Next Step Dance Studio. In order to win Riley back, James suggests she gives him a list of tasks to complete to prove his dedication, starting with breaking up with Beth. Emily further isolates herself from the team to gain Amanda's trust. When Michelle won't answer calls from the studio, Chloe visits Michelle at school.

episodes.name: Sacrifice
episodes.overview: Reality-style drama following the lives of a group of dancers at the Next Step Dance Studio. Emily encourages Hunter to try to get closer to the boys. James creates a new dance move for Riley's list. Gabi is jealous when her younger sister Becca is chosen for a J-Troupe trio.

episodes.name: Heartbreaker
episodes.overview: Reality-style drama following the lives of a group of dancers at the Next Step Dance Studio. Eldon challenges Hunter to win back the nationals solo award. Emily is forced to prove her loyalty to Amanda by ending something that is just starting. James searches for a four-leaf clover for Riley's list.

episodes.name: Hello Trouble
episodes.overview: Reality-style drama following the lives of a group of dancers at the Next Step Dance Studio. Thalia, Giselle, and Amanda represent the Next Step at a trio competition. When Michelle comes to watch, Amanda is forced to change her plans. James tackles number ten on Riley's list and decides to get to know Emily.

episodes.name: Lost
episodes.overview: James turns to the boys for help to solve a riddle for Riley. The A-Troupe costumes for Nationals go missing. Emily's loyalties are tested.

episodes.name: Better Than This
episodes.overview: James gets his driving licence for Riley. Michelle searches for something she loves as much as dance and joins the debate team at school. Amanda learns that Emily cannot be trusted.

episodes.name: Under Pressure
episodes.overview: Emily tries to expose Amanda but gets caught in her own trap. Kate discovers the Next Step's money is missing and holds Chloe responsible. Riley enlists James to take CPR training with her for the studio.

episodes.name: Just Dance
episodes.overview: Amanda's true colours are exposed but the results are devastating for the Next Step. Emily catches West doing a good deed. Riley enlists James to convince a studio ex-member to come back.

episodes.name: Water It
episodes.overview: Reality-style drama following the lives of a group of dancers at the Next Step Dance Studio. Officially back together, Riley and James struggle to find their chemistry on the dance floor. Emily and West get to know each other better. Michelle gets a bolster to her confidence from an old friend.

episodes.name: Run This Town
episodes.overview: Reality-style drama following the lives of a group of dancers at the Next Step Dance Studio. Successful choreographer Luther Brown drops in on the Next Step to help the boys with their small group routine. Thalia and Giselle are in a rush to try to teach Michelle the nationals routine. James gives Eldon dating advice.

episodes.name: Re-Match
episodes.overview: Reality-style drama following the lives of a group of dancers at the Next Step Dance Studio. Successful choreographer Luther Brown drops in on the Next Step to help the boys with their small group routine. Thalia and Giselle are in a rush to try to teach Michelle the nationals routine. James gives Eldon dating advice.

episodes.name: Old Friends
episodes.overview: Eldon learns he must compete against Daniel in the male solo round. Daniel's competitiveness stains his friendships with his old teammates.

episodes.name: I Don't Know
episodes.overview: Small Groups and duets compete at the Nationals competition. James struggles with whether to include a challenging move in the small group routine.

episodes.name: What Are You Waiting For?
episodes.overview: Michelle is pitted against Amanda in the female solo round.

episodes.name: You Love Me
episodes.overview: A reality-style drama following the lives of a group of dancers. It is the semi-finals and the team showcases their dance.

episodes.name: Danger Zone
episodes.overview: A reality-style drama following the lives of a group of dancers. The team awaits a verdict as to whether Emily can dance or whether the team has to forfeit.

episodes.name: Rewind
episodes.overview: Amanda's bid to dance with the Next Step is accepted by the judges.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: A-Troupe are going to the Absolute Dance Nationals! But with a new competition, comes new challenges. In the search for the best team, an opportunity arises for dancers from other studios that didn't win Regionals to try out for a spot on the Nationals team. But could this come at the cost of tearing apart the team who won Regionals together?

episodes.name: Coming Home?
episodes.overview: A-Troupe is reunited after their Nationals win, but the celebrations are short lived. The team must find a new place to dance, or make a big sacrifice; James helps plan his aunt's wedding

episodes.name: Game, Set and Match
episodes.overview: Kate decides to finally tell the dancers the truth.

episodes.name: Secrets
episodes.overview: Emily learns that she will not be able to dance for at least 8 months. Riley confronts Emily. Lucien makes a deal with Miss Kate.

episodes.name: Let the Games Begin
episodes.overview: Dancers compete one on one for a spot on the internationals team.

episodes.name: The Fallout
episodes.overview: Some members of A-Troupe struggle to adjust to change. Meanwhile, a friend departs; and B-Troupe expands.

episodes.name: The Times They Are a Changin'
episodes.overview: Giselle faces a familiar opponent in her battle; Chloe defends her place on the team; the ownership of The Next Step is decided.

episodes.name: Your New Beginning
episodes.overview: New Elite members are having a hard time adjusting; James plans a surprise for Riley.

episodes.name: I'm Your Captain
episodes.overview: Shantel challenges Giselle for the dance captain position; James asks for Riley's help in planning his aunt's wedding; the A-Troupe loses a dancer.

episodes.name: The Nutcracker Prince
episodes.overview: Eldon challenges West to audition for a ballet company; West asks for Chloe's help.

episodes.name: Can't Fight This Feeling
episodes.overview: Thalia wonders about Eldon and Michelle; Chloe gets an exciting opportunity; Richelle develops a crush.

episodes.name: Marry Me
episodes.overview: James meets his aunt's fiancee; Eldon and Thalia teach a class.

episodes.name: Do the Right Thing
episodes.overview: Chloe must choose between joining a ballet company and staying at The Next Step; Thalia gets to the bottom of Eldon's odd behavior.

episodes.name: Put You First
episodes.overview: James and Riley try to find each other the perfect anniversary gift; Giselle and Thalia are unsure about performing with Amanda; Noah's abilities are put to the test.

episodes.name: I Hope I Get It
episodes.overview: A dancer from England joins The Next Step; Riley shows the newcomer around. Amanda tries to avoid going to Sweden.

episodes.name: The New Girl in Town
episodes.overview: A dancer from England arrives and joins the Next Step, and Riley must mentor her. Meanwhile, Amanda attempts to get out of going to Sweden.

episodes.name: Sweet Spot
episodes.overview: James is preoccupied with his band and can't devote time to his duet with Riley for Internationals, so Ella helps her let loose. Meanwhile, Eldon and Thalia try to uncover the studio's sweet spots.

episodes.name: Square Dance
episodes.overview: As the tension from Internationals mounts, Riley and Ella help the group relax by tricking them into learning square dancing.

episodes.name: Mixed Messages
episodes.overview: Ella has Riley and James take a closer look at their relationship. Elsewhere, Thalia and Eldon devise clandestine ways of communicating.

episodes.name: Never There
episodes.overview: Michelle is struggling with her parents' divorce, and this affects the team. Meanwhile, James and Riley try to see things from one another's perspectives; and Ella tries to convince Noah that A-Troupe is the right place for him.

episodes.name: Cry Me a River
episodes.overview: Eldon is to compete for the Internationals male solo title, but Noah wants to have a shot and show Eldon that he is just as good as he is.

episodes.name: Today I'm Getting Over You
episodes.overview: A-Troupe pairs up with B-Troupe to do duets.

episodes.name: It's My Party
episodes.overview: The Next Step welcomes Amanda back from Sweden. Riley and Ella play one last prank on James before Ella goes back to England.

episodes.name: Welcome to Miami
episodes.overview: In Miami for internationals, Riley is forced to work off her bill as a waitress after she is unable to pay for her meal.

episodes.name: Lost at Sea
episodes.overview: Kate and Giselle arrive to register for internationals, but James is trapped on a boat, adrift in the alligator-filled Everglades.

episodes.name: When the War is Over
episodes.overview: On the day of the male and female solo round, Eldon struggles with the loss of his lucky coin and Riley's friendship with Ella is tested when they have to compete against each other.

episodes.name: We Are the World
episodes.overview: With the small group round fast approaching, Michelle, Giselle, Riley, and Cierra are angry to see that Stephanie isn't putting in as much effort as she should be into practising and consider replacing her. Meanwhile, Thalia must compete with four dancers from different countries in the first round of Internationals, and Eldon begins to suspect that her Polish team-mate cares about more than just dance.

episodes.name: Blind
episodes.overview: The dancers find out that in the second round of Internationals, the dance they had prepared will have to be performed blindfolded. As they struggle to make it work, it becomes apparent that they need to change which dancers perform.

episodes.name: Turn, Turn, Turn
episodes.overview: Eldon competes against seven other dancers to determine how much time their teams will have to prepare for the next round. The team scrambles to adjust their quarter-finals routine to new music.

episodes.name: She's Not You
episodes.overview: The Next Step performs a ten-person dance against Ella's team in the semi-final round of Internationals. A key dancer's sudden illness threatens the team's chance to move on to the finals.

episodes.name: How It Ends
episodes.overview: The Next Step battles for the title of international champion against the team from Sweden. James and Riley put everything on the line to give their team a chance at winning.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: The Next Step Dance Studio must overcome their own professional and personal challenges on their journey towards Absolute Dance Internationals.

episodes.name: One More Time
episodes.overview:
Miss Kate and the Next Step dancers hold an Open House to welcome prospective new dancers to the studio.
Meanwhile, some veteran A-Troupe members say their farewells as they prepare to move on.

episodes.name: Stir It Up
episodes.overview: Auditions for A-Troupe get underway, and Amanda and Eldon make big decisions. Meanwhile, Skylar and Cierra demonstrate their sisterly devotion to one another when they make a pact.

episodes.name: Heads Will Roll
episodes.overview: Guest choreographer, Stephanie, challenges the dancers at the afternoon auditions.

episodes.name: Welcome To The Jungle
episodes.overview: The new A-Troupe dancers are revealed, and Piper decides to form a club with her nervous fellow newbies; Riley is offered the opportunity of a lifetime, and Cierra and Amanda both vie for the final open spot on A-Troupe.

episodes.name: Square One
episodes.overview: Riley assigns a trio competition to prepare for the first Regionals qualifier. Amanda and Michelle are threatened by Richelle.

episodes.name: London Calling
episodes.overview: West receives a mysterious package from London, England, which leads to a big surprise for the bros. Noah and Amanda collaborate on a song.

episodes.name: Walk This Way
episodes.overview: James prepares to leave for London.

episodes.name: Runaway
episodes.overview: Riley learns that Alfie is hiding a big secret, and his future at The Next Step is in jeopardy. James, West, and Eldon arrive in London, England for the Bangers & Mashups International Hip-Hop Extravaganza.

episodes.name: Dancing with Myself
episodes.overview: Noah's rehearsal prompts a discussion about which trio should be showcased to represent The Next Step. Meanwhile, Michelle wants Alfie to help her bolster her concentration skills on the dance floor; and Sloane gets pranked by Amy and Cassie.

episodes.name: Simple Twist of Fate
episodes.overview: As A-Troupe dances at the Qualifier, Amanda struggles to find the right time to share her feelings for Noah, while Noah continues to hide his back injury.

episodes.name: On the Rocks
episodes.overview: After the studio competes at the qualifier, Riley reconsiders her position as studio head. Noah and Amanda grow closer, but his back injury might get in the way.

episodes.name: Knowing Me, Knowing You
episodes.overview: Noah reveals how he feels about Amanda. LaTroy and Sloane get into a fight after he receives an invitation he can't refuse.

episodes.name: The Game Belongs to Me
episodes.overview: Michelle's competitive side is on full display when she's pitted against Piper to compete at the qualifier. LaTroy seeks out Amy's help to be the best dancer he can be.

episodes.name: I Can't Go For That
episodes.overview: Riley gets invited to an exclusive gala, and has to decide who to invite as her date. Skylar struggles to find her place on A-Troupe.

episodes.name: I Only Have Eyes For You
episodes.overview: Amy makes LaTroy a proposition, but things get complicated when Sloane discovers new feelings; West and Eldon have an adventure in London.

episodes.name: Love Will Tear Us Apart
episodes.overview: Michelle and Riley have a lunch date and take a walk down memory lane; Noah, afraid of losing his spot on A-Troupe, continues to hide his back troubles.

episodes.name: Nobody's Fault but Mine
episodes.overview: Riley considers removing the team from competition because of a change in the qualifier rules. Meanwhile, the guys go on the hunt for Eldon's missing phone in London; and Sloane has trouble accepting Amy and LaTroy's relationship.

episodes.name: Your Time Is Gonna Come
episodes.overview: The guys compete in a hip-hop event in London. Elsewhere, Riley and Alfie's bond intensifies; and Noah's hidden injury begins to hurt the team.

episodes.name: How Deep Is Your Love
episodes.overview: Alfie considers Noah's health problems and surprises Riley with a plan for the qualifiers. Meanwhile, Amanda and Noah open up to one another; and LaTroy makes an unexpected decision in the wake of receiving news from his dad.

episodes.name: Heat of the Moment
episodes.overview: Auditions for the qualifier duet have added significance in the wake of Noah's diagnosis. Meanwhile, LaTroy plots to salvage Sloane and Amy's friendship; and Alfie opens up to Riley about his feelings for her.

episodes.name: Kiss and Tell
episodes.overview: Piper has trouble keeping a secret. Meanwhile, Amanda learns a secret skill from Henry; and an undesirable task is given to Amy and Sloane.

episodes.name: Rumour Has It
episodes.overview: Piper gives Riley an ultimatum to tell James about her kiss with Alfie and Riley struggles to decide what to do.

episodes.name: Here Comes Your Man
episodes.overview: Amanda's cousin Cooper shows up to visit the studio and notices the tension between Riley and Piper.

episodes.name: Tainted Love
episodes.overview: Riley tells James about the kiss. West and Eldon battle at the Bangers and MashUps competition in London. Noah and Amanda struggle with the next step in their relationship.

episodes.name: A Fool In Love
episodes.overview: Riley asks James for some space to sort out her feelings for Alfie and Alfie misinterprets where Riley is at.

episodes.name: Karma Police
episodes.overview: Emily shows up to help Riley get The Next Step to Regionals, but she has to make some hard choices to do it.

episodes.name: Only You
episodes.overview: Emily and Riley choose a dance captain and deal with the qualifier duet.

episodes.name: Danger Zone
episodes.overview: Riley asks James for an impossible favour for the studio.

episodes.name: Rivalry
episodes.overview: James and Alfie represent the Next Step at the final qualifier.

episodes.name: Shake it Off
episodes.overview: Riley makes a mistake with Alfie and tries to make it up to him.

episodes.name: It Ain't Easy
episodes.overview: Riley questions her relationship with Alfie.

episodes.name: Bold As Love
episodes.overview: Alfie asks Riley to go on a trip. She does, but not where he planned.

episodes.name: Taking Care of Business
episodes.overview: Jiley is reunited! But the team has lost a member.

episodes.name: The Edge of Glory
episodes.overview: The team prepares to leave for regionals. Cassie is made the alternate dancer but still tries to help the team.

episodes.name: Even Better Than the Real Thing
episodes.overview: The team competes in the first round at regionals but it is not what they expected.

episodes.name: Don't Stop Me Now
episodes.overview: The Next Step competes in the sudden death trio round. Michelle pushes herself before the trio dance in order to be ready.

episodes.name: Livin' On A Prayer
episodes.overview: With Sloane disqualified and Michelle injured, the team does not have enough dancers to dance in the final.

episodes.name: A Change Is Gonna Come
episodes.overview: Now that Alfie is back, the team is able to compete in the Regionals final. But when Michelle shows up ready to dance, Riley has to make a heartbreaking decision.

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: After winning Internationals in Miami, A-Troupe has made a name for themselves in the dance world, putting The Next Step Dance Studio on the map. But their return to Regionals means the departure of beloved team-meates, forcing the team to start from scratch. A-Troupe must fight harder than ever to make it back to the top.

episodes.name: The New Regime
episodes.overview: Shot in the style of a reality show, 'The Next Step' follows a group of dancers who go to "The Next Step Dance Studio", a place where they can compete in dance competitions and strive to do their best. As the A-Troupe dancers prepare for the regional dance com

episodes.name: Go West, Young Michelle
episodes.overview: Michelle, dissatisfied with Emily's dance studio philosophy, starts her own team, TNS West, and discovers some surprising new talent.

episodes.name: Dance, Lies and Hoverboards
episodes.overview: A self-trained dancer, Kingston, must prove himself to keep his spot on Michelle's new troupe.

episodes.name: Leon Me
episodes.overview: TNS East hires a guest choreographer, Leon Blackwood, to teach a Hip Hop workshop and TNS West shows up to join in.

episodes.name: It's All Fun and Games...
episodes.overview: After being assigned a duet, Noah struggles to find the chemistry on stage with Richelle because of his feelings for Jacquie.

episodes.name: No Good Deed
episodes.overview: Piper's determination to help Amy get on to A-Troupe has a surprising outcome. Things start to heat up with Noah and Jacquie.

episodes.name: Heathers
episodes.overview: TNS West needs two more dancers to round out their team, and Piper thinks she may have found the perfect new recruit.

episodes.name: 12 Hour Party People
episodes.overview: TNS West throws a dance-a-thon fundraiser, which is attended by some exciting guest stars.

episodes.name: A Tale of Two Eldons
episodes.overview: In advance of the TNS East/West face-off to determine which troupe will represent the studio at regionals, Michelle's troupe gets their tenth and final dancer. Michelle thinks her dreams have come true, but her new member could turn out to be her worst nightmare. Eldon double-books himself as choreographer for TNS East and West, and struggles to keep his commitment to both. Things between Lola and Jacquie get complicated when their team's featured soloist is chosen.

episodes.name: United and Divided
episodes.overview: When TNS East and TNS West have a dance-off to determine home studio advantage for the coming battle, Elliot reveals his true colours.

episodes.name: East Meets West
episodes.overview: Emily has a secret weapon in the dance battle to determine which troupe will get to represent The Next Step at regionals.

episodes.name: Brave New World
episodes.overview: Kingston and Ozzy think there's something suspicious about Elliot's generosity, and discover he's hiding a shocking secret.

episodes.name: Civil War
episodes.overview: When the tensions between TNS East and TNS West reach an all-time high, Miss Kate is forced to make a drastic decision.

episodes.name: Stand Together or Fall Apart
episodes.overview: Piper and Amy develop a secret plan to get back on the road to regionals. Jacquie is tempted to leave the studio.

episodes.name: This Changes Everything
episodes.overview: Piper and Amy's secret plan is put into action, as the dancers rally to unite the studios under one banner.

episodes.name: Stand and Deliver
episodes.overview: With troupe united, it’s time to elect a new dance captain. Piper helps Amy to find the strength she needs to finally have an honest conversation with her mother. Heather is asked to perform a task for Emily, but is tempted to bail on it when she sees a chance to be one of the gang.

episodes.name: Oh Brother! Why Art Thou Here?
episodes.overview: Josh's brother, Adam, shows up at the studio unannounced with surprising news. When Zara realizes her split focus is affecting her chances at a coveted solo, she is forced to choose between her two passions. Heather and Piper feel their lack of hip hop skills could hurt the team, and they enlist Henry's help to turn things around.

episodes.name: I Have a Vision
episodes.overview: With the deadline for the Regionals qualifier video looming, The Next Step scrambles to perfect their routine in time.

episodes.name: Snap Decision
episodes.overview: Lola strives to stop Richelle from making a huge mistake. Noah and Jacquie struggle in their new roles on A-Troupe. Ozzy missteps when the team is counting on him most.

episodes.name: Pointe of No Return
episodes.overview: The Next Step's hope of going to Regionals hinges on today. Richelle makes a horrifying discovery. Piper tries to work up the courage to ask out her crush.

5.name: Season 5
5.overview: Since losing at Regionals, A-Troupe is once again the underdog, but that won’t deter them from getting back to the top. As many dancers leave to pursue their goals and dreams, former dance captain Emily steps in to take control of the studio. But her strict regime isn’t welcomed by everyone and the studio quickly divides into two. Only one team can make it to Regionals and it’s a full out battle between East vs. West.

episodes.name: Grave New World
episodes.overview: As the new strict studio head of the Next Step is revealed, so is the fate of Michelle and Emily.

episodes.name: Wink It Out
episodes.overview: To help Piper, Noah strikes a bargain with Miss Angela's daughter, Lily, which ends in surprising results.

episodes.name: Dancezilla
episodes.overview: Richelle is back and A-Troupe desperately hopes she will bring down Miss Angela.

episodes.name: Coup d'Etat
episodes.overview: With the help of A-Troupe, Richelle sets in motion a plan she hopes will rid the Next Step of Miss Angela.

episodes.name: Summer Lovin'
episodes.overview: Piper returns to TNS as Michelle and Emily are reinstated and face their first challenge as co-studio heads.

episodes.name: Mean Twirls
episodes.overview: Summer is tricked by dancers who are threatened by her, while TNS rents out some rehearsal space to a new dance team: AcroNation.

episodes.name: Oh Solo Me-Oh
episodes.overview: New relationships are put to the test when TNS has a solo competition.

episodes.name: Mash-Up Match-Up
episodes.overview: Surprising new friendship dynamics arise as TNS gears up for the dance convention.

episodes.name: Amy's Prom Has Got It Goin' On
episodes.overview: The announcement that TNS is going to hold a prom sends dancers into a frenzy.

episodes.name: Twinkle Toes
episodes.overview: Prom night at TNS ignites new flames, old rivalries, and a whole lot of dancing.

episodes.name: Never Been Picked
episodes.overview: In her quest to prove her worth at The Next Step, Amy brings her A-game to A-Troupe... with surprising results.

episodes.name: Convention Tension
episodes.overview: Amy feels the pressure when she and AcroNation dances off against various studios for the Wild Card spot at regionals.

episodes.name: Sweet and Salty
episodes.overview: A five bonus point advantage for regionals hang in the air as Summer, Amy, and Lily compete for the top soloist title.

episodes.name: Ty'd to You
episodes.overview: As Michelle and Emily deal with a troubling revelation about regionals, family and friendships face new challenges.

episodes.name: All the Marbles
episodes.overview: When Noah's fate at The Next Step is put to a vote, arguments ensue over what to do.

episodes.name: Less Beauty, More Beast
episodes.overview: Less Beauty, More Beast. When two surprise judges visit, A-Troupe vies for featured parts in the regionals.

episodes.name: Contemporary Contempt
episodes.overview: The dancers are split into pairs to determine the contemporary routine, leading to new tensions on A-troupe.

episodes.name: Little Big Lies
episodes.overview: After candidates for the alternate position are announced, Ozzy struggles with a big secret.

episodes.name: Pas De Don't
episodes.overview: TNS and Acronation find themselves competing for rehearsal space with regionals at stake.

episodes.name: Audition Subtraction
episodes.overview: Noah attends an audition, while A-troupe works furiously to keep their team intact.

episodes.name: Dancing with the Enemy
episodes.overview: A proposition from Lily compels Davis to make a decision that could affect A-Troupe.

episodes.name: His Girl, Summer
episodes.overview: A-Troupe scrambles to adjust to the loss of one of its dancers.

episodes.name: A-Troupe Escape
episodes.overview: A-Troupe's ability to work as a team is tested when they are locked in an escape room.

episodes.name: No Shell
episodes.overview: The Next Step arrives for day one of Regionals and A-Troupe is feeling the pressure

episodes.name: And Then There Were Three
episodes.overview: At the finals of the Regionals, TNS deals with uncertainty as they are called to perform.

episodes.name: Piano Man
episodes.overview: With a showdown looming, several dancers question their future.

6.name: Season 6
6.overview: After a major shock sends the studio reeling, The Next Step finds themselves scrambling to get back on the road to competition. But while some of the dancers think it should be all for one and one for all, others declare that when it comes to winning… all bets are off. Can the dancers put aside their differences to bring home a victory?

episodes.name: The Goodbye Girl
episodes.overview: A-Troupe surprises Michelle with an emotional goodbye, which ends in an unexpected outburst from Emily

episodes.name: The Comeback Kid
episodes.overview: A former member of A-Troupe returns with the hopes of rejoining the studio, but finds her past isn’t easily forgiven. Richelle and Kenzie make a startling discovery about Miss Angela’s fate after Absolute Dance put her on probation, while Henry is floored when Summer’s Oracle Cards make some surprisingly accurate predictions

episodes.name: Alternate Universe
episodes.overview: Auditions for the alternate position are more competitive than ever as a new group of talented dancers vie for the spot.

episodes.name: Three's a Crowd
episodes.overview: Tired of being pulled in different directions by her two best friends, Piper gets Finn and Amy together in the hopes of sparking a friendship between them, but finds it quickly turning into a disaster. Meanwhile, Summer struggles to keep track of rehearsals, adjusting to unexpected changes in A-troupe. Ozzy and Heath are forced to set aside their differences when tension boils between the two that places them at risk of losing their place at the studio. Cleo, a fresh face to TNS, tries to move up the ranks by making friends with Richelle.

episodes.name: Good Night and Good Luck
episodes.overview: With a thunderstorm raging outside and rehearsal time running out, Henry struggles to pick up the choreo for a nationals routine. Trying to help Henry, Summer finds their relationship tested. After the lights go out in the studio, Kingston, Ozzy, and Lily discover that someone shut the power off on purpose and everyone at the studio becomes a suspect. Heath and Izzy bond over their survivalist ways, much to Ozzy’s dismay.

episodes.name: The Favourite
episodes.overview: When Summer makes a choice affecting Henry's spot at Nationals, he questions her decision, leading to a difficult realization about their relationship. Piper cancels plans with Finn and Amy at the last minute, and the pair spend the day getting to know each other, with surprising results. Meanwhile, Cleo clashes with an unruly Jude in rehearsal and makes a discovery about why Jude struggles to learn choreo.

episodes.name: A Star is Born
episodes.overview: Nick brings a surprise guest to the studio to help a confused group of A-Troupe dancers step out of their shells. Nick runs through a series of teambuilding exercises with Emily in the hope of bringing them closer together but finds Emily’s trust isn’t easily earned. And a revelation about an exciting opportunity drastically affects A-Troupe’s future.

episodes.name: The Bicycle Thief
episodes.overview: A-Troupe decides to take on a new opportunity, but Nationals are right around the corner, and the studio is busier than ever. A well-known dancer is brought in to choreograph a nationals duet for Lily and Kingston, and discovers their dance chemistry is better when they are fighting. Piper agrees to help Finn plan a first date with a new girlfriend but discovers a truth that could complicate everything before it even begins. Nick’s limitations become apparent when he tries to choreograph a dance for A-Troupe and it doesn’t go well, while Ozzy is stunned when he uncovers a secret romance at TNS.

episodes.name: The Fall of Summer
episodes.overview: Summer is blindsided after Richelle returns from an Absolute Dance convention and changes the choreo for a routine. A-Troupe votes on which choreo they prefer, which leads to a stunning result. Uncovering a blossoming romance, Ozzy is asked by the couple to keep it secret, which Ozzy is more than happy to do as long as they’re willing to do whatever he asks. Meanwhile, Heath feels like an outsider and Cleo encourages him to step out on his own.

episodes.name: A Tale of Two Auditions
episodes.overview: A-Troupe buzzes with excitement, ready to perform for the biggest opportunity of their lives. But their excitement is cut short when Summer fails to show up. Piper and Amy's friendship is tested when Piper catches Amy stirring up the past.

episodes.name: There Can Only Be One
episodes.overview: Emily finds a staggering fact that could spell the end of A-troupe's chances at nationals and the end of one dancer's spot on the team. Fearful of jeopardizing her friendship with Amy, Piper attempts to keep her feelings secret, but Finn uncovers what she has been trying to hide. Meanwhile, Henry learns a hard lesson about honesty after he reveals his true feelings about Kingston's latest news.

episodes.name: Lights, Camera, Action!
episodes.overview: Piper deals with the aftermath of Finn learning her secret, and a new challenge appears.

episodes.name: A Fine Showmance
episodes.overview: Finn's attempts to cheer Amy up fall flat, while Lily teams up with Kenzie to form a plan.

episodes.name: B-Troupe, Best Troupe!
episodes.overview: Summer wrestles with a decision that throws her plans with Cleo off the rails.

episodes.name: The Absolute Face of Funder Bros
episodes.overview:
Piper’s attempts to come clean to Amy fall flat after she learns some unexpected news.

English

episodes.name: The Friendly Skies
episodes.overview: Amy struggles to forgive Piper but gains a different perspective after helping Henry.

episodes.name: Eight Crazy Dates
episodes.overview: Love is in the air at TNS when Henry arranges a special date but has some unwanted guests.

episodes.name: Just Duet
episodes.overview: Emily gets an offer from a secret admirer that could mean the end of her time at TNS.

episodes.name: Big Decisions
episodes.overview: Summer receives a letter with a life-changing opportunity that would ruin Cleo's plans.

episodes.name: Dance, Dance, Resurrection
episodes.overview: A-Troupe is left scrambling after one of its dancers leaves unexpectedly.

episodes.name: Room Service
episodes.overview: The Next Step lets off some steam before a major performance.

episodes.name: And So It Begins
episodes.overview: A-troupe take the stage in the next chapter of their dance careers.

episodes.name: Play It Again, Finn
episodes.overview: A sudden twist threatens to spoil A-Troupe’s future in dance.

episodes.name: It All Comes Down to This
episodes.overview: A-Troupe makes a stunning decision.

7.name: Season 7
7.overview: As A-Troupe speeds towards Nationals, things take an unexpected turn when a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity shakes up the studio. A-Troupe struggles to stay united as they face the biggest decision of their dance careers. Does A-Troupe have what it takes to make it on dance’s biggest stage? Will a new group of talented dancers emerge as the future of TNS? This season, all bets are off.

episodes.name: Today for You, Tomorrow for Me
episodes.overview: The Nationals are back on - but which team is going? A-Troupe or B-Troupe?

episodes.name: Journey to the Past
episodes.overview: A TNS legend suggests a controversial solution to the Nationals dilemma.

episodes.name: I Can Do That
episodes.overview: Talented and hungry dancers show up for the Challenge, which could shake The Next Step.

episodes.name: Another Suitcase in Another Hall
episodes.overview: Auditions continue, and a new A-troupe will be formed.

episodes.name: I Dreamed a Dream
episodes.overview: Richelle and Shad hold auditions to find a soloist to be the lead in Step Inside.

episodes.name: Never Had A Friend Like Me
episodes.overview: Kenzie goes through her first challenge as Dance Captain of A-Troupe, and Kingston has trouble picking a duet partner.

episodes.name: Perfect For You
episodes.overview: Lily struggles to focus on dance while avoiding more pressing issues. Ozzy tries to find Richelle the perfect venue for Step Inside.

episodes.name: My Philosophy
episodes.overview: Jude, Ethan, and Ebby compete to become the Nationals soloist and Ozzy and Heath's investigation has devastating results.

episodes.name: When I Grow Up
episodes.overview: Amy hopes to fail her prestigious audition and Piper wonders if that’s really a good idea. Meanwhile, Richelle and Shad try to convince Nick to invest in Step Inside.

episodes.name: The Move In My Mind
episodes.overview: Shad surprises Richelle and they share a beautiful moment. Heath vows to mend Ozzy and Kingston’s relationship, but his efforts morph into an eventful search for the mole.

episodes.name: Tomorrow
episodes.overview: When the mole’s identity is revealed, Richelle and the Step Inside cast must start from scratch the day before their big performance!

episodes.name: You Can't Stop The Beat
episodes.overview: It’s showtime! With an online audience waiting, plus a few surprise visitors, the pressure is on… but Richelle discovers she may be about to lose everything she’s worked for.

episodes.name: One Song Glory
episodes.overview: Intermission is over! Piper and Amy bet on themselves in an attempt to impress Drew before Richelle and TNS dance what might be their final number as a team.

8.name: Season 8
8.overview: A fierce rivalry begins as A-Troupe and B-Troupe battle to decide which team will represent The Next Step at Nationals. When the dust settles, one team must overcome their underdog status and prove they have what it takes to be champions, while the other decides to stop playing by anyone else's rules and show the world they are true triple threats.

episodes.name: Count Me In
episodes.overview: As A-Troupe prepares for internationals, Ultra-Elite finds a new studio to call home. Meanwhile, Jude makes a big decision that might change everything.

episodes.name: Tutu Can Play That Game
episodes.overview: Grace wants auditions for A-Troupe, but Kenzie needs convincing. Anthony runs A-Troupe rehearsal, welcoming the wrong person to be a fly on the wall.

episodes.name: Setting the Barre
episodes.overview: The competition is tough in the first round of auditions, and Heath struggles to focus when he is grouped with someone he can’t trust.

episodes.name: Tapped Out
episodes.overview: As A-Troupe auditions continue with the solo round, the dancers have to get their heads in the game - but not everyone is playing fair.

episodes.name: Bad Attitude
episodes.overview: At the request of Ariana, Jett shows the newcomers around, while Izzy and Ebby help with the team’s first Internationals challenge.

episodes.name: Break Down
episodes.overview: Heath helps Pete confront his feelings as A-Troupe prepares for the internationals livestream challenge.

episodes.name: An Internationals Twist
episodes.overview: Ariana faces a difficult decision during the internationals livestream challenge. Meanwhile, Ethan and Ebby both want to go on exchange to France.

episodes.name: Bridge the Gap
episodes.overview: Kenzie deals with an important personal decision and its consequences, while Ariana helps Jett with an apology.

episodes.name: Off Balance
episodes.overview: In the absence of a dance captain, Nick is in charge. He assigns a trio to Olive. which forces her to confront the drama within her former friend group.

episodes.name: Beat the System
episodes.overview: Eldon runs a chaotic group rehearsal, and Izzy learns an important leadership lesson. Meanwhile, Pete and Heath do everything in their power to look like dance captain material.

episodes.name: Swing Vote
episodes.overview: Ariana comes to a realization as she fights her way through the Dance Captain Battle Royale, and the international twists are far from over.

episodes.name: Takes Two To Tango
episodes.overview: With internationals fast approaching, the new dance captain faces a huge decision.

episodes.name: Pointe of No Return
episodes.overview: Grace tries to decide the alternates on Ariana’s behalf as Pete makes a shock discovery.

episodes.name: How'd It Turnout?
episodes.overview: Everything is on the line as A-Troupe have to re-qualify for internationals.

episodes.name: Waltz Back In
episodes.overview: Anthony is put in a tough position when Ariana asks to be let back on the team.

episodes.name: Just Duet
episodes.overview: Eldon chooses the Internationals duet as Kenzie considers a big opportunity.

episodes.name: That's a Stretch
episodes.overview: Eldon fights Anthony over who should represent TNS in the Home Field Advantage competition, while Ebby deals with a dilemma.

episodes.name: Split the Difference
episodes.overview: Kenzie and Team France's Camille have plans that might not be best for A-Troupe.

episodes.name: Dance, Party!
episodes.overview: TNS hosts L'Equipe Etoile for a pre-Internationals welcome party - but drama ensues!

episodes.name: Can-Can We Do This?
episodes.overview: As Internationals begin with a surprise performance, Anthony struggles with the small group dance thanks to a classic Internationals twist.

episodes.name: Sole Connection
episodes.overview: A surprise guest changes everything for Ariana, while Adele and Anthony deal with sabotage before their duet.

episodes.name: Take the Leap
episodes.overview: In the final round of Internationals, A-Troupe face off against fearsome competitors, sticking together through their biggest challenge yet.

9.name: Season 9
9.overview: Hot off their triumphant win at Nationals, A-Troupe face their own personal challenges, dealing with loss, disappointment, and failure on the road to Internationals. But if they’re able to bounce back from their personal losses, and help each other through the tough times, they will learn what it truly means to win.
